source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens with an extreme wide shot, showing a gray pedestrian ramp in the foreground at the bottom of the frame. A dark brown fence occupies the middle ground in the center, with a large beige apartment building in the background at the top. The camera then shakily zooms in, reframing the scene into a wide shot. This zoom reveals a shirtless person in the middle ground, positioned centrally behind the fence. The person moves on a skateboard from the right side of the frame to the left, remaining behind the fence as the shot continues to zoom in on the background building.
